author: lypanov
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Start up WSL (1607).
Fire up Powershell inside WSL (running self built master as of October 17th / or powershell_6.0.0-alpha.10-1ubuntu1.14.04.1_amd64.deb).
Press enter key 9 times.
## Expected behavior

Shouldn't wrap to top of window.
## Actual behavior

Wraps back to top of window rather than using all available space.
## Environment data

Name                           Value

---

PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.10
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1```
